snippet.title: MEGA R-Type DEMO Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for the upcoming Mega Drive/Genesis R-type 3-stages Demo.

DEMO 1.1 IS OUT NOW ON: https://theroboz.itch.io/mega-r-type

After 37 years, it's almost time to finally blast off and strike!

CREDITS

PROGRAMMING & GFX : @TheRoboZ (Andrea Baldiraghi), Dedicated to my Son, Dorian.

Arcade GFX Rips: Goemar (Richard Ashmore)             - https://retrogamezone.co.uk/rtype.htm
                                Carsten666                                         - @Carsten1349

  Mega Remix Music: CYBERDEOUS (Cyan & @laurent_crouzet) - cyberdeous.bandcamp.com
                                                                                                                   youtube.com/@cyberdeous

  Arcade & Amiga Music: CLBNA (@ClbnaVgm)                             - clbna.bandcamp.com
  Based on original arrangements by Masato Ishizaki and Chris Hulsbeck

  Artworks: SEGA16BIT_OST              - @SEGA16BIT_OST
                    Thomas Pringle                - @thomaspringle1

  SGDK Libraries: Stephane-D             - @MegadriveDev

  Thanks to: Michael T                         -  youtube.com/@NXGamer
  Mega Drive Hardware Courtesy of:    youtube.com/@AVKStudio
